caption.p: Superoxide anion ( A) scavenging assay in the absence (a) or in the presence of 60, 30, 15, 7.5, and 3.7 μg/mL of HEO (b–f, respectively); Hydroxyl radical ( B) scavenging assay in the absence (a) or in the presence of 15, 7.50, 3.75, 1.85, and 0.92 μg/mL of HEO (b–f, respectively). The asterisks (**) indicate significant differences ( p < 0.05). Each value represents mean ± SD ( n = 3).
